LL.B. course must have passed +3 Degree Arts / Science / Commerce Examination or any other examination recognized by the academic council of the F.M. University to be equivalent thereto, having secured at least 45% marks of the total marks in such exams. are eligible to apply for admission. However in case of the SC/ST students this is relaxable to 40%. Provided that such a minimum qualifying mark shall not automatically entitle a candidate to get admission.
Course_Detail: Balasore Law College offers 3 years LLB Degree Course in Six semesters having 30 papers in whole as per new curriculum designed by Bar Council of India & approved by F.M. University, Odisha. Admission into 1st yr LLB course is made some times after publication of +3 degree course result of F.M. University.

Eligiblity: The candidate should have minimum 55% marks in BA LLB (5 years) or LLB (3 years) are required for seeking admission to the course.
Course_Detail: The LL.M. course is of two years which is divided into four semesters. This syllabus is prepared (on choice based Credit System) for Master of Laws (LL.M) examination. The 1st Semester shall cover the period from June to November & 2nd Semester from December to May and the 3rd Semester shall commence from June to November and 4th Semester from December to May.

College: KV Ranga Reddy Law College, Hyderabad
Eligiblity: Candidate should have passed Graduate Degree Examination of minimum three years duration(10+2+3 pattern) of a recognized University with at least 45% marks of aggregate marks(40% marks in case of SC/ST categories) in the qualifying examination. If any candidate secured less than 45% in graduation, he should have passed any additional graduation or Post Graduation with 45% marks.
Course_Detail: LLB is a full time three years course affiliated to Osmania University, Hyderabad and approved by BCI.

College: KV Ranga Reddy Law College, Hyderabad
Eligiblity: Candidate should have passed two-year Intermediate Examination(10+2 pattern) with at least 45% marks (40% marks in case of SC/ST categories) in the qualifying examination or any other examination recognized as equivalent to Intermediate by the University, Board of the Intermediate education board, and Bar Council of India.
Course_Detail: LLB Five Years is a full time three years course affiliated to Osmania University, Hyderabad and approved by BCI.

College: Uttranchal Institute of Hospitality Management and Tourism, Dehradun
Course: Post Graduate Diploma In Cyber Law
Approval: Ministry Of Health and Family Welfare Government Of Uttarakhand
Eligiblity: The candidate should have passed Graduation in any stream.
Course_Detail: Post Graduate Diploma In Cyber Law (PGDCL) is one-year duration course affiliated to Uttarakhand Open University, Haldwani.

College: Ramaiah Institute of Legal Studies, Bangalore
Eligiblity: Candidates must be 10+2 passed in any discipline from a recognised board of education.
Course_Detail: BA LLB is a full time five years undergraduate course affiliated to Karnataka State Law University and approved by Bar Council of India.

Eligiblity: Graduation with General and OBC and Minority 45% Marks.S.C./ST 40% Marks in any discipline.
Course_Detail: LLB is a three year full time course affiliated to University of Lucknow, Lucknow and approved by Bar Council of India.

Eligiblity: 10+2 with General, OBC and Minority 45% Marks. S.C./ST 40% Marks in any discipline.
Course_Detail: LLB Hons is a five year Integrated course affiliated to University of Lucknow, Lucknow and approved by Bar Council of India.

Eligiblity: Graduation min 50% for Non Sponsored.
Course_Detail: LLB is three year duration full time course offered by Amity University, Kolkata and approved by Bar Council of India (BCI).

Eligiblity: The candidate should have Graduation degree in relevant subject from any recognized University.
Course_Detail: LLB is three year duration full time course affiliated to Hemchandracharya North Gujarat University, Patan and approved by Bar Council of India (BCI).

College: C Bheema Sena Rao National College of Law, Shimoga
Eligiblity: The candidate should have passed XII (10+2) examination from any recognized Board.

College: C Bheema Sena Rao National College of Law, Shimoga
Eligiblity: The candidate should have Graduation degree in relevant subject from any recognized University.
Course_Detail: LLB is three year duration full time course affiliated to Kuvempu University, Shankaraghatta and approved by Bar Council of India (BCI).

Eligiblity: Graduate or Post Graduate Degree with minimum of 45 % Marks in Aggregate. For Candidates belonging to SC/ST/OBC the minimum eligibility is 40% marks in aforesaid examinations.
Course_Detail: Bachelor of Laws is full time three year course degree offered by Mohan Lal Sukhadia University, Udaipur and approved by Bar Council of India.

Eligiblity: LL.B. or M.A. Sociology / Economics / Social Work / Psychology / Public Administration / M. Com. Business Administration / MBA / MHRM with 48% marks in the aggregate.
Course_Detail: Post Graduate Diploma in Labour Laws is full time one year course diploma offered by Mohan Lal Sukhadia University,Udaipur and approved by BCI.
